Description: This template deploys a Connection Broker (master) and a file server for home directories and profiles.

RdcbEc2InstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the RDCB File Server

RdcbEc2InstanceIp.Description: IP address of the RDCB File Server

AmiId.Description: (Optional) AMI ID -- will supersede Lambda-based AMI lookup using AmiNameSearchString

AmiNameSearchString.Description: Search pattern to match against an AMI Name

DataVolumeSize.Description: Size of the data volume to attach to the instance

DataVolumeSnapshotId.Description: (Optional) Snapshot ID of an existing EBS volume. Leave blank to instantiate an empty volume

DomainAccessUserGroup.Description: Domain group of users authorized to use the remote access solution

DomainDirectoryId.Description: ID of the AWS Directory Service domain, e.g. d-xxxxxxxxxx

DomainDnsName.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the forest root domain, e.g. example.com

DomainNetbiosName.Description: NetBIOS name of the domain (e.g. EXAMPLE)

Ec2SubnetAz.Description: Availability zone of the private subnet

Ec2SubnetId.Description: Private Subnet ID where the file server will run

ExtraSecurityGroupIds.Description: List of extra Security Group IDs to attach to the RDCB EC2 instance

InstanceType.Description: Amazon EC2 instance type for the Remote Desktop Session Instance

KeyPairName.Description: Public/private key pairs allow you to securely connect to your instance after it launches

NoPublicIp.Description: Controls whether to assign the instances a public IP. Recommended to leave at "true" _unless_ launching in a public subnet

NotificationEmail.Description: (Optional) Email address to subscribe to notifications and alarms

SsmKeyId.Description: KMS Key ID used to encrypt/decrypt the SsmRdcbCredential

SsmRdcbCredential.Description: SSM Parameter Name for a SecureString containing the domain credential for the RDCB service account; SSM Parameter Value format is '@{Username = "<user>"; Password = "<password>"}'

Properties.AlarmDescription: Trigger alarm when C: volume has less than 20% free disk space
Trigger alarm when D: volume has less than 20% free disk space
Trigger alarm when C: volume has less than 40% free disk space
Trigger alarm when D: volume has less than 40% free disk space
Trigger a recovery when instance status check fails for 15 consecutive minutes

Fn::Join: Write-Verbose 'Waiting for SSM to complete domain join, which reboots the instance automatically' -Verbose

Properties.GroupDescription: Logical container for an RDCB EC2 instance
